name: VooDoo Village
description:
VooDoo Village is a turn-based strategy game utilizing an everchanging stock market. Your objective is to help VooDoo develop the economy for a town that he plans to develop on the island that you have arrived on. While shops must be created in order to sell goods, taking the time to build a shop isn't always the best strategy to maximize profits. In VooDoo Village you must compete for resources while in a race to make the most out of the island and come out on top.

Best when played with 2-4 players, though there is a single player mode with no competition. 

(Left click to move, right click to collect, M to toggle map, tab to view inventory, ctrl to view tile stats)
